product_name: Outdoor Research Filament Down Pullover - Men's
long_description: Light as a feather and made for winter adventure, the Outdoor Research Filament down pullover boasts an incredible warmth-to-weight ratio for outstanding insulation that won't weigh you down. Premium 800-fill-power goose down is extremely compressible and warm; pullover fits easily underneath a waterproof jacket on wet days. Ripstop Pertex Quantum nylon resists tears and abrasion; quilted baffling keeps down in place to prevent clumping and cold spots. Half-zip opening allows ventilation; elastic binding on cuffs seals in body heat. Outdoor Research Filament down pullover features a zippered chest pocket to keep small items secure.
short_description: Light as a feather and made for winter adventure, the Outdoor Research Filament down pullover boasts an incredible warmth-to-weight ratio for outstanding insulation that won't weigh you down.
